column2: "Na ɔman no mu mbapɔmba no tsenaa Jerusalɛm: na ɔman no nkaa no dze
column3: wɔtwee tonto dɛ wɔdze nyimpa du mu baako bɛtsena Jerusalɛm
column5: na baakron no so atsenatsena nkurow nkaa no mu."

column2: "Na ɔman no hyiraa mbarimba no a woyii hɔn yamu dze hɔnho mae dɛ wɔbɛtsena Jerusalɛm no."
"Afei woyinom nye amansin mu etsitsir a wɔtsenaa Jerusalɛm no na Juda nkurow no mu dze
column3: obiara tsenaa n’egyapadze do wɔ hɔn nkurow do
column8: na Solomon no nkowaa mba no."

column2: "Na Jerusalɛm hɔ na Judamba no mu bi
column3: na Benjaminmba no mu bi tsenae. Judamba no mu: Ataia a ofi Uzia
column7: na Mahalalel ebusuasantsen no a wofi Perezmba no mu no;"
na Zekaria a wofi Silonnyi no n’asefo mu no."

column2: "Perezmba nyinara a wɔtsenaa Jerusalɛm no wɔyɛ mbarimba ahaanan eduosia awɔtwe a wɔyɛ ndam."

column4: nyimpa no yɛ ahaakron eduonu awɔtwe."

column3: Zikri ba no nye hɔn hwɛdofo: na Juda
column5: nye nyia otsia ebien a ɔhwɛ kurow no do."

column7: na Ahitub a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn fi mu panyin no n’ebusua mu
column9: "na hɔn nuanom a wɔyɛ ofi no mu edwuma no. Hɔn dodow yɛ ahaawɔtwe eduonu ebien. Na Adaia a ofi Jeroham
column26: ɔha eduonu awɔtwe: na hɔn hwɛdofo nye Zabdiel

column5: Hasabia na Bunni ebusua mu no;"

column2: "na Sabbethai na Jozabad a wofi Levifo mu etsitsir no mu
column3: hɔn na wɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn fie edwuma no do
column7: na Asaf a ɔyɛ otsitsir a odzi aseda mpaabɔ adwontow no enyim no ebusua mu
column8: na Bakbukia a odzi do wɔ no nuanom mu no; na Abda
column9: Sammua a ofi Galal na Jedutun ebusua mu no ne ba no."

column2: "Levifo nyinara a wɔwɔ kurow krɔnkrɔn no mu no wɔyɛ ahaenu eduowɔtwe anan."

column5: na hɔn nuanom a wɔweɔn nkuropon ano no
wɔwowɔ Juda nkurow no nyinara mu

column2: "Asɔrfi mu asomfo no dze wɔtsenaa Ofel: na Ziha na Gispa na wɔhwɛ Asɔrfi mu asomfo no do."
"Na Levifo do ɔhwɛfo so a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm nye Uzi a ofi Bani
column6: na Asafmba no mu adwontofo no a wɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn fi mu edwuma no do no ebusua mu."

column2: "Na ɔhen hɔ mbrasɛm bi wɔ hɔn ho
column3: na wɔaahyɛ edzidzidze bi ama adwontofo no
Mesezabel ba no a ofi Juda ba Zera mba mu no
column4: na ɔdze ɔhen no nsaano wɔ ɔman no ho nsɛm nyinara mu."
Judamba no mu bi tsenatsenaa Kiriat-arba na no nkuroba mu
column5: na Dibon na no nkuroba mu
column6: na Jekabzeel na no nkuroba mu;"

column3: na Beer-seba na no nkuroba mu;"
na Mekona na no nkuroba mu;"

column6: Azeka na no nkuroba. Nna wɔtsenatsenae fi Beer-seba kodur Hinom bɔnsa mu."

column2: "Benjaminmba so tsenae fi Geba araa kɔr Mikmas na Aija
column3: na Bɛtɛl na no nkuroba mu."
nkyekyɛmu bi a wɔyɛ Juda dze no bi kɛkaa Benjamin ho."
